description:
Midge and the others try to find a way to see the footage on the video tape that supposedly has evidence of the Earth`s destruction on it. Doc does some investigating, and learns that they can use Humpty to watch the tape, but the bugs have get around the frogs to get access to their robot. Finally able to view the footage, the bugs are devastated by what they see. Midge and the others now have to decide on whether or not to continue on to Earth. Meanwhile, a mysterious new enemy approaches the frogs and Geroppa is captured and taken away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Video Tape Playback Plan / Disappointing Enceladus
Videotape Saisei Keikaku / Shitsubou no Enceladus
ビデオテープ再生計画 / 失望のエンケラドゥス
